DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy ocular sirolimus ( rapamycin ) formulation compare Placebo sign symptom dry eye CAE Model .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Ranging Clinical Study Assess Safety Efficacy Subconjunctival Injection Sirolimus Patients With Dry Eye Controlled Adverse Environmental ( CAE ) Model
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include , limited : Have report history dry eye eye ; Have history use desire use eye drop dry eye symptom within past 6 month .
